Create data frame for split-plot design

Source: R/utils_design.R
df.splitplot.Rd

Create data frame for split-plot design

Usage

df.splitplot(trt.main, trt.sub, replications)

Arguments

trt.main

a vector representing the number of levels of main plot treatment factors sequentially.

trt.sub

a vector representing the number of levels of sub plot treatment factors sequentially.

replications

number of replications at main plots

Value

a data.frame with columns for main plots, main treatments, and sub-treatments

Examples

df.splitplot(3, 4, 15)
#>     mainplots trt.main trt.sub
#> 1           1        1       1
#> 2           1        1       2
#> 3           1        1       3
#> 4           1        1       4
#> 5           2        2       1
